DOC.brief_title: Hardwins - Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head & Neck ( Surgery/RT )
DOC.criteria: Histologically proven squamous cell carcinoma Larynx & pharynx ( except Nasopharyngeal carcinoma ) Stage III & IV , stage hypopharynx Informed Consent
